trans-unit.source: Deploy an API app with a new gateway
trans-unit.target: Deploy an API app with a new gateway

trans-unit.source: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy an API app with a new gateway and new App Service plan.
trans-unit.target: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy an API app with a new gateway and new App Service plan.

trans-unit.source: Provision an API app with a new gateway
trans-unit.target: Provision an API app with a new gateway

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys an Azure API app and a gateway.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template that deploys an Azure API app and a gateway.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and

trans-unit.source: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.
trans-unit.target: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.

trans-unit.source: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.
trans-unit.target: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating templates, see [Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating templates, see [Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about deploying apps, see [Deploy a complex application predictably in Azure](../app-service-web/app-service-deploy-complex-application-predictably.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about deploying apps, see [Deploy a complex application predictably in Azure](../app-service-web/app-service-deploy-complex-application-predictably.md).

trans-unit.source: For the complete template, see [API app with new gateway template](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/201-api-app-gateway-new/azuredeploy.json).
trans-unit.target: For the complete template, see [API app with new gateway template](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/201-api-app-gateway-new/azuredeploy.json).

trans-unit.source: What you will deploy
trans-unit.target: What you will deploy

trans-unit.source: In this template, you will deploy:
trans-unit.target: In this template, you will deploy:

trans-unit.source: API app
trans-unit.target: API app

trans-unit.source: new gateway
trans-unit.target: new gateway

trans-unit.source: new App Service hosting plan
trans-unit.target: new App Service hosting plan

trans-unit.source: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:
trans-unit.target: To run the deployment automatically, click the following button:

trans-unit.source: eploy to Azure]
trans-unit.target: eploy to Azure]

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parameters

trans-unit.source: hostingPlanName
trans-unit.target: hostingPlanName

trans-unit.source: The name of the App Service plan.
trans-unit.target: The name of the App Service plan.

trans-unit.source: hostingPlanSettings
trans-unit.target: hostingPlanSettings

trans-unit.source: The settings for the new hosting plan.
trans-unit.target: The settings for the new hosting plan.

trans-unit.source: Variables
trans-unit.target: Variables

trans-unit.source: This template defines a variable which is used when deploying the resources.
trans-unit.target: This template defines a variable which is used when deploying the resources.

trans-unit.source: The value is used below as **variables('packageId')**.
trans-unit.target: The value is used below as **variables('packageId')**.

trans-unit.source: It contains the NuGet package Id for API apps.
trans-unit.target: It contains the NuGet package Id for API apps.

trans-unit.source: Resources to deploy
trans-unit.target: Resources to deploy

trans-unit.source: Hosting plan
trans-unit.target: Hosting plan

trans-unit.source: Creates the service hosting plan for the API app.
trans-unit.target: Creates the service hosting plan for the API app.

trans-unit.source: Web app that hosts the gateway
trans-unit.target: Web app that hosts the gateway

trans-unit.source: Creates a web app that hosts the gateway.
trans-unit.target: Creates a web app that hosts the gateway.

trans-unit.source: Notice that **kind** is set to **gateway** which notifies the Azure portal that this web app is hosting a gateway.
trans-unit.target: Notice that **kind** is set to **gateway** which notifies the Azure portal that this web app is hosting a gateway.

trans-unit.source: The portal will hide the web app from the browse web apps blade.
trans-unit.target: The portal will hide the web app from the browse web apps blade.

trans-unit.source: A link is defined between the hosting web app and the gateway.
trans-unit.target: A link is defined between the hosting web app and the gateway.

trans-unit.source: The app settings section includes necessary values for hosting the API app.
trans-unit.target: The app settings section includes necessary values for hosting the API app.

trans-unit.source: The **serverFarmId** contains the App Service plan name that you provided in the **hostingPlanName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: The **serverFarmId** contains the App Service plan name that you provided in the **hostingPlanName** parameter.

trans-unit.source: Gateway
trans-unit.target: Gateway

trans-unit.source: Creates the gateway.
trans-unit.target: Creates the gateway.

trans-unit.source: The hosting web app is defined as a property of the gateway.
trans-unit.target: The hosting web app is defined as a property of the gateway.

trans-unit.source: Web app that hosts the API app
trans-unit.target: Web app that hosts the API app

trans-unit.source: Creates a web app that hosts the API app.
trans-unit.target: Creates a web app that hosts the API app.

trans-unit.source: Notice that **kind** is set to **apiApp** which notifies the Azure portal that this web app is hosting an API app.
trans-unit.target: Notice that **kind** is set to **apiApp** which notifies the Azure portal that this web app is hosting an API app.

trans-unit.source: The portal will hide the web app from the browse web apps blade.
trans-unit.target: The portal will hide the web app from the browse web apps blade.

trans-unit.source: The app includes an extension
trans-unit.target: The app includes an extension

trans-unit.source: to install the default empty API app package.
trans-unit.target: to install the default empty API app package.

trans-unit.source: A link is defined between the API app and the hosting web app.
trans-unit.target: A link is defined between the API app and the hosting web app.

trans-unit.source: The app settings section includes necessary values for hosting the API app.
trans-unit.target: The app settings section includes necessary values for hosting the API app.

trans-unit.source: The **serverFarmId** contains the App Service plan name that you provided in the **hostingPlanName** parameter.
trans-unit.target: The **serverFarmId** contains the App Service plan name that you provided in the **hostingPlanName** parameter.

trans-unit.source: API app
trans-unit.target: API app

trans-unit.source: Creates the API app.
trans-unit.target: Creates the API app.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the names of the hosting web app and gateway are defined as properties in the API app.
trans-unit.target: Notice that the names of the hosting web app and gateway are defined as properties in the API app.
